content.detailedDescription: It was on a golf corse... it was like a huge flying frizzby that was on fire itlasted 5 seconds

We were sitting on front porch abd i saw what i thought was a low flyingairplane above the tree line.  then the way it was moving i thought it might bea helicopter.  had my husband look and my daughter came home then so she watchedand i went in and got my son to come out. it came over the tree tops and wherethe creek is it stopped and turned and came towards us. by now we are out on thesidewalk looking up and it was right over us.  maybe 50 ft off the ground.  itjust hung above the house for maybe about 5 min. we were just looking straightup at the thing.  there were 3 lights on each corner and what seemed like alotof little lights under.  my husband saw what looked like a purplish swirrlinglight underneath.  it slowly moved off, but we watched it for maybe a couple ofhours as it was making a grid pattern across the creek from us.  but what got methe most was the lights.  they were very bright but gave off no illumination.The sound was like a very low humming.  we lost no time or power.  my dog wasout on the porch with us but she never moved from her spot even when we werejumping around so scared.  she normally be right there with us.  that wasstrange.  i finally had to try to go to sleep so i had to give up on it.  akeith conroy in utica, ny contacted us about a year later.  he had an article inthe paper asking if anyone has seen a ufo.  so i wrote in and he did interviewus.

I was a passenger in a car driven by my boyfriend and we were heading to thegrocery store.  i saw an object high in the sky that was cigar shaped and i keptmy eye on it thinking it was an odd plane.  i just kept looking at it for abouta minute or a little over and then suddenly it disappeared.  i was shocked tosee it vanish on such a clear day so i said something to my boyfriend about it. he did not witness it at all.  i have remained puzzled by what i saw so decidedto report it.
content.summary: Saw silver cigar shaped craft in daylight that dis

content.detailedDescription: Ill start from the beginning.When i was 2 or maybe 3  years old ,  i woke up  floating  above the crib,itdidnt shock me at first  for some reason. it was like being  half asleep. i openmy eyes looked down at the crib and took a quick glance at the ceiling and thenclose my eyes and when to sleep. but whats strange about the whole thing, periodically growing  up i would think about it but not take it seriously. inever told anybody.The second encounter, i was  14 years old. i was watching t.V in the livingroom,with my 2 brothers and my little sister   and my mom was watching t.V inher bedroom. it was about 6 or 7pm at night  i was watching the six milliondollar man show i was sitting near the front door on one side of the t.V set andmy other brother was sitting on the other side of the t.V  and my older brother was lying down on the sofa and my little sister was in a chair. and thats whenit happen, i had a strong feeling of someone or something  being outside so iopened the door looked around didnt see anything,and then i looked up into thesky and there it was a flying saucer itwas  like a stone throw away. iwas shocked i couldnt say or do anything for acouple of seconds and then i saw the spaceship started to turn around , when itdid, i saw the two aliens there was a yellow light, i didnt see any facefeatures all i saw were  silhouettes, two bodys  one was sitting down, like driving the ship and the other one was standing up and looking around and thenthey saw me the one that was standing up started to point at me and thespaceship  was coming closer   i could see features on the spaceship plus itdidnt make a sound and when it started to get closer i  slam the door shut, iwas lost for words i couldn
content.summary: Saw flying  disc and aliens inside

content.detailedDescription: See for yourself.  my fiancee and i were watching fox news network live from baghdad war coverage.  during the night vision scenes of the city during the first blackout, you could see the unidentified objects spiraling very rapidly through the sky in front of the camera. we had watched a show about the unknown and how these images are being captured on still camera and video, but yet do not appear to the naked eye on either discovery or tlc - these objects we viewed were identical to the footage the unknown show had shown during their description of these objects.  they thought perhaps it was an unknown insect species or alien species of some sort. but in trying to look for more information on these objects, we ran into no further information available to our findings.
content.summary: Several pencil-shaped objects spotted on fox news

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard two nights ago and saw a plane fly over, which is very normal, but after the plane had flown a little bit to the side and was no longer directly in front of me, a white light zoomed to the ground. i went straight, and ended up behind a mountain that is nearby. i did not see anything more. the light was white, and though it could possibly have been a meteorite, it went straight downward, which i have never seen a meteorite do, and it was evening, so i am not sure that it was dark enough for me to have seen a meteorite. i looked around to assess whether it was dark enough, and saw that there were a few stars overhead, but in the direction that the light had been seen there were no stars yet in the sky, and it was not very dark yet. i don't know whether or not it had anything to do with the plane, but it happened just as the plane had flown out of the area that the light came from. it almost looked like something had tried to hit the plane and had missed not literally, but that was the sequence of things. i dont know what to think of it.
content.summary: Saw streak of light in evening right after a plane

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned home from drawing class. i pulled up the laneway we live on100-acre farm, got out, and looked up at the clear night sky, admiring the view.While so entranced, i made a prayer, as is my custom in such moments, for peace,interstellar togetherness, love and that sort of thing.Then, scanning the sky, i came across a black triangle directly overhead, movingquite slowly, and silently, towards the southeast. this is about 6km nw ofchesley, on, for which i gave the coordinates above. i watched it pass in frontof stars and temporarily block them from view. it had a small white, maybeblue-tinged light at each corner, and had a scalene shape, that is, if it was anisosceles triangle, it seemed to be slightly on edge, tilted to one side. it wasclose to the width and length of my thumb at arms length. actual size wasimpossible to determine, as there was no texture or point of reference. it movedalong and after about 4 minutes became too hard to see, so i went inside . itwas cold out.This is not my first sighting of unusual craft, having previously seen an orangesphere may 1997 in north bay, on--multiple witnesses and a white light thatturned red and raced away at high speeds winter 2000-2001, in elmwood, on, bymyself. keep doing what you do. i love reading the monthly updates. one love.

It was night time and my friend ricky and i were out on his trampolein. it wasabout midnight when i saw them, i thought it was just some planes but they weremoving unlike any plane i have ever heard of. they were moving onlynorth,south,east,and westtrue north. they didnt come close or move away theystayed the same and they only moved in straight lines and made right angel turnsmy friend was sleeping this whole time.After about a minite they came together,stayed right next to eachother for about 5-10 seconds then shot off in oppisitedirections.West and east.      i wish to remain anonomis because i dont want thefeds knocking on my door.
content.summary: Saw bright dots in the sky moving in verticle and

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out in the country heading to a store in a city. we weredriving along and happened to notice a ball shaped object in the sky blinkingred, green, yellow, purple and blue. we were mesmorized. so we stopped the truckand got out to look at it. then we seen 2 more, of the same objects in differentplaces in the sky. we used binochulars but all we could make it is that theyappeared to be ball formed and the lights flashed different colors all the wayaround them. we werent sure what it was but we both know it was nothing we haveever seen before. so now that we are all excited about what we saw, we continueddriving down the road. i was continously watching the sky out my window and thefront window as we drove along. we got about 10 miles or so down the road andsuddenly this light thing appeared in the sky. it was extremely low to theground and headed right towards our truck, well over it anyway. so we jumped outonce again to see what this was. thinking it may have been a plane or somethingflying really low. but as it came closer to us we noticed the light pattern onit was weird. it had 3 bright white lights in the front, in a straight line fromleft to right, and 3 bright lights in the back, in a straight line from left toright. also it had red and green lights on the sides. it was nothing i have everseen before. it just flew over top our truck quickly and really low, but made nosound. my husband stated he could see right through it, as it was transparent. ididnt take notice though as i was too intrigued with the lighting system on theobject. it just dissapeared into the night. i would really like some input onthis if you can offer any as i stated before, my husband nor i have never seenanything like we have seen tonight. thanks..................Ira and rebecca.

I was sitting in the passenger seat of my car while my 1512 year old daughterwas driving east on manatee drive in navarre florida near gulf breeze.Up in the clear almost dusk sky was a silvery rectangle shaped object hoveringin one place about 3,000 feet up in front of me.   a plane passed over it andstill it remained hovering.  i asked my daughters if they could see the object,they both said yes.  they also described it as i saw it. the object stayed inthe sky above me for 3-4 minutes and then in an instant second it was gone.  ithought it may be a star but a star is round and not rectangular. i remainedcalm and was totally amazed by this thing. i just told this account to myhusband and he told me to report it to mufon.
content.summary: Witnessed rectangular shaped  object in the sky
Large silent white light emiting object moving at

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i went to see some friends of ours and their baby.  we werewatching cnn news war on iraq. we were just chatting about the war and lookingout at the lake when i noticed red lights hovering above the neighbors house 2doors down.  i  looked at my partner and said do you see that  he says ya i seethat.  wow.  our friend was talking to us and he turned around to try to seewhat we were talking about.  the door was open and i jumped up and ran out toget a better look.  by the time we got to the door it was gone.  no noise nonothing.  gone.  their living room is all windows so there is no way i couldhave missed it.  our friend did not see it and i know it was not a car orsomething passing by.  it was dark out but there was like 5 red lights tracingaround the craft and it had one red light on the top.  i feel like they werewatching us in the house.  and when i got up to run to the door they took off.

It is about 630 am and as i was writing the following the hairs on my arms and face stand upand at times tears come down my eyes. i tried to do my best describing just acouple of my experiences for you but at times, for my emotions i am short ofwords to describe my exdperiences. so if youre interested you may call me andill tell you more.Please forgive any punctuations, misspellings or grammatical errors, as its verylate for me.One night at the south western academy dorm in san marino, i was in bed gettingready to sleep. i heard a very loud low and pulsating humming for a few secondsshaking the buildings window glasses, then i saw pulsating different colorlights falshing, lighting up the out side area. then i saw the thick main powerline was burnt with a bright white light and fuzzing, so
content.summary: I was taken out of my body to meet beings for comm

content.detailedDescription: Two friends of mine and i were driving west about to enter beaverdam, ohio.  iwas looking out of the sunroof at a bright star almost directly above us, thenglanced down at the traffic ahead of us.  just as i did, right to the north-westof us, past the town, i saw a big flaming object falling to earth with a longfiery tail.  it appeared to me to look like a meteor, and it was falling atabout a 45 degree angle.  but the first thing that went through my head was thatit was a military attack, because of the war.  but i quickly realized that itwasnt.  the object disappeared behind the treeline, but there was no explosionor any indication of an impact.  all three of us saw it, but i saw it for thelongest duration.  the other two in the car thought at first that it waslightning, but what i saw was most definitely not lightning.  however, theyimmediately admitted to each other that it was not lighting, as well.This all took place in less than 30 seconds.For the next 5-10 minutes, we continued down lincoln hwy. and the entire time, ikept looking in the exact direction of where the object should have impacted, bymy judgement.  and i saw nothing else.
It was so fckin scary man i mean this big ass bitch flew outa the sky andscared the shit outa me

A friend was walking me out to my car as i was getting ready to leave.  wehappened to look up into the clear night sky and notice a plane heading towardsthe air port.  we could identify the plane as a civialian model because of thebright white light in front, red lights on wings, and flashing light in back. this plane was moving from the west heading eastward.  as we watched the planewe noticed what we thought to be a satellite moving northward.  we then realizedit was too low in altitude and moving too fast to be one.  it was glowing whiteand was an orb or sphere shape.  this light was about the entire size of theplane.  as we watched both the plane and the white glowing sphere, we noticedthat it looked as though both were at the same altitude.  both came close tomeeting each other and we thought that they were going to hit each other at onepoint.  upon approaching the plane, the orb zig zagged off to the east a littledistance and then remained heading north bound.  they barely missed each other. once they crossed paths, the orb started heading northeast as though to turnaround, but then started zig zagging back and forth from east to west in a sharpalmost 90 degree angel turns.  then it appeared to ascend and disappeared in theclear night sky.  my friend and i were worried at first that plane and orb wouldhit each other.  as the event went on however, we realized that the orb was acraft that we could not reconginize.  both of us were excited about thesighting.  in my opionion, whatever was in the sky with the plane at that timewas under intelligent control and was not an air craft of any type that i amaware of.

I was walking my dog when i looked up and saw a silent round orange light highin the east over riverside heading west.  it traveled directly overhead andproceeded to approx. anaheim hills where it stopped hovered.   it then fired avery narrow beam to earth that had an electric or firey effect.  i was waitingfor some kind of explosion, but none was heard.  it then proceeded to the southeast and became progressively faint until it dissapeared.
content.summary: Orange object hovers over anaheim hs., fires narro

content.detailedDescription: First object all of which were triangular in shape caught my attention becauseit did not have lights, was moving at a high rate of speed, and was able to slowinstantaneously and then suddenly resume its speed. i did not hear any soundscoming from it. it happened so quickly that i was left wondering what it couldhave possibly been. within a few seconds or so, 3 additional craft in atriangular formation passed over head at a high rate of speed but not nearly asfast as the first object. what happened next was really breathtaking. anotheraircraft presumably the first one i witnessed approached the formation at a veryhigh rate of speed. it stopped its rate of speed on a dime to join the formationof the others.
We were in a room  during a usual lesson, when we saw a big great light, comingtowards us it was ur mum
content.summary: The bournville shock  birmingham, selly oak

content.detailedDescription: Witness #1 was walking her dog in the backyard of her house.  witness #1 saysthat the clear, transparency and the light made her notice the object.  atfirst, the witness stated that she thought it was a remotely piloted object, butit made no sound.  the witnesses actions were first that of being scared andmade her backtrack.  after the sighting, she had a feeling of elation.  theobject was a clear, transparent orb with a starlike object in the center (like achristmas tree ornament) which sort of wobbled and hovered before taking off ata high rate of speed over the rooftop of the witness house (easterlydirection).
content.summary: Clear, transparent orb with starlike object in cen

content.detailedDescription: This probably sounds stupid.  i am forty years old and this happened when i wasaround 9 yrs. old.  i was in the house and i thought i should go outside, summerevening, not too late, nice weather and as a kid i just wandered outside,nothing unusual.  i went to the back yard and this caught my eye.  right above aneighbors street lamp was a moon.  honestly, a moon, revolving and it wasshowing the street light on it like the moon does the sun.  it was revolvingfairly fast and it even had crater marks.  i was amazed and for a second thoughtthe moon was crashing but then thought it was an asteroid or meteor but thenwondered why it was hovering above the street lamp.  i felt very calm duringthis and fascinated.  i went to get my parents and yelled for them to comeoutside and ran back to the back yard, the thing was just a small speck aboutthe size of a raisin in the sky and disappeared.  it was fairly large when itwas above the street light, my folks just shrugged when it was not there.Later, i had some very unusual awake dreams where the munsters, yes the munsterswere touching me and talking to me and raising me up to sitting position andlaying me back down in my bed, nothing scary but i could feel them even though icould see right through them.I have always wanted to relay this to see if this sounds like anything anyonemay relate to.  i swear it did occur and i do not believe it was hallucinationbut i dont know.Rodney beason2100 wilson road apt 122knoxville, tn 37912i will be changing email at the end of the week so i can be mailed regular mailif anything seems to be anything with this.  if not, sorry to have taken up yourtime but thank you anyway.
content.summary: A moon right above a street lamp

content.detailedDescription: All happens when nato bombed serbia
Driving home from work and saw bright light in sky ahead of us it seemed to moveupward very fast with no trail behind it then dissappeared in a westerlydirection.

1.  my fiance dan and i were fishing at a fishing hole at the time. late night.2.  i noticed the object because sometimes when youre fishing, you get bored,and i was just gazing at the sky.  i noticed a starlike object moving very highin the atmosphere, north to south, in a slow fashion.3.  i pointed it out to dan and he noticed it-he said looks like a satellite tome.  that seemed sensible to me but i continued to watch it move across the sky.I wasnt afraid but curious.4.  dan started watching it with me. we first noticed something was wrong when asmall plane flew by,and the object stopped in its tracks and was completelystill in the sky. when the plane had passed, it resumed its northsouth movement.This got our riveted attention. the plane seemed to cause it to stop.Throughout the entire incident, we did not move from our location.5.  as i said, it stopped when the small plane went by, and then resumedmovement. it appeared that it was hiding because when it was stopped it lookedjust like another star. after the plane went by we watched it move around. itstarted doing strange, abrupt turns-also it would stop, start, turn on an angle.It did not seem to gain or drop in altitude. there was no sound-i assumedbecause it was so high we couldnt hear it-yet the small plane that passed andcaused it to stop was at about 1000 feet.We watched it for some minutes as it changed direction, stopping, starting. thenall at once it just-from a stop-sped off upwards at an incredible speed-i cannoteven estimate the speed-perhaps 700 mph and out of sight immediately.6.  as i said, it sped off and was out of sight within 1 second.
content.summary: Viewed a flying object performing oddly at night.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on route 55 about 15 or 20 miles from route 80. i was goingabout 80 mph when i looked out my side window and noticed something hovering inthe air across the road and back in the field. i said to myself ,that cant beand looked again. im sure i saw a ufo. the object was hovering above a field atabout a 30 degree angle toward me. i could see daylight between the bottom ofthe ufo and the power lines. driving in traffic didnt allow another look...Iread in the chicago paper a few days later about some strange events that day inthe near area and just wnted to add my little part...Sorry im five years late..
content.summary: Saw saucer shape hovering in air

content.detailedDescription: I was driving up country club rd. and noticed what looked like an ordinary jetwith a trail in the northern sky. i stopped at the corner of glenn st. to getout and saw just a point of white light no trailbrighter than venus movingslowly between me and the santa catalina mts. moving east to what seemed likethe ventana canyon resort are before going away. could not explain that one,indeed

i was lying in bed with my gay lover when a saddam shaped man entered my room...We felt odd...He pulled out his pudd and started whacking away right theres was nothing we could do but enjoy...We didnt want to,but were strangely compelled to. he then inserted his manhood into my bum...It felt hard and sticky. at this point george,my gay lover orgasmed onto my back. saddam then mentioned that he would make me fuck stanton friedman if i mentioned this incident to anyone. though i think stanton is a hottie,so i dont mind. saddam then ordered his men in black and el chupacabra to probe me and fingerbang my boyfriend in every orifice of his sweaty bod. during this time the fbi called and warned me to not tell anyone, or david duchovny would rape me until george w. bushnot my boyfriend george has a threesome with ari fleischer and colin powell. saddam left me a parting gift of a bill of a24300 for various porn orders he made on my credit card. i feel ill and stickyand its just not right that this could happen to me and my sexy george. can youhelp us please my bum is sore and no one believes me help us please

I was in my cab near the intersection of stone  lester in tucson and noticed abright and white shining star about as bright as venus would be seen in thedaytime in the north part of the sky about the position polaris would be and sawit move slowly towards the zenith overhead area and then west before it could nolonger be seen due to thin clouds, lasting about 15 and twinkling like a starthe whole time. p.S. say hi to ken storch, can you i could not locate my reportfrom area 51. i will try the nevada state tourism office as i did send it tothem.
Saw a real bright star-like object as bright as venus at the beginning oftwilight, knowing it was not venus due to being an amateur astronomer, and thenfaded out in a few seconds.
